hero.bio-text: Software Developer with 6 years of experience in front-end development of web pages and native applications. Graduate in systems analysis.

more-about.dx-list1: I developed web administration panels and web pages for the company.
more-about.dx-list2: I managed and maintained native applications in Android Studio.
more-about.ontop-list1: I worked on the development and maintenance of this home using Webflow.
more-about.ontop-list2: As a frontend, I was dedicated to the development and maintenance of this website.

project.project1-desc: I developed this example of a Home for my previous work.
